message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, I am only able to offer $1200000 for it. I hope this aligns better with the value I place on the item.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1350000. This is a fair compromise considering the value I place on the product and the value you seem to think it's worth. What do you think?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position and respect the value you place on the product. I would like to offer $1300000 for it. I hope this proposal will be acceptable.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm getting closer to your price, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. I'll sell the product to you for $1325000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $1300000 for the product. I hope this will be acceptable.

Bob, I've made a significant concession already, and I'm not willing to go any lower. However, I'm willing to give you a small discount to sweeten the deal. I'll sell the product to you for $1325000, but I'll throw in a special bonus that's worth $25000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
